70010000085070.description:
In a space travel, a accident makes Billy D. and your friends fall in this obcure planet. The objectives are clear, find his friends, recover the items and to escape from scary beings that inhabit the darkest places.

You will be a fugitive, avoid direct contact with the monsters to succeed in each level.
Run, jump, have accurancy in your movements to collect items.

Trio Adventures are one of the most beautiful 2D platform games. All the characters are fun and each level has a unique look and are part of the story of the game.
70010000085070.intro: In a space travel, a accident makes Billy D. and your friends fall into this obcure planet. Now the adventures starts and only you can save tham.
70010000085070.name: Trio Adventures

70010000087562.description:
Step into the prehistoric era of dinosaurs and embark on a thrilling evolutionary journey! Dinosaur RPG - Dino Survival Simulator Survivor offers a unique blend of survival, exploration, and RPG elements, all set in lush, dynamic biomes waiting to be explored.

 Here’s what you can expect:

• Evolutionary Gameplay: Experience 10 immersive chapters, each representing a different dinosaur's life. From the nimble Compsognathus to the mighty Tyrannosaurus Rex, relive the awe-inspiring life cycles of iconic dinosaurs.

• Dynamic Biomes: Navigate through dense forests, scorching deserts, roaring waterfalls, and volcanic terrains. Each biome offers distinctive challenges, resources, and secrets.

• Customization & Growth: Upgrade and personalize your dinosaurs! Enhance their speed, strength, and skills. Plus, with unique skins and roars, make your mark in the Dino Survival Simulator.

• Missions & Challenges: Overcome 50+ missions! Hunt, forage, defend territories, and engage in epic duels. Each mission is tailored to test your survival instincts and strategic prowess.

• Community & Trade: Form clans, communicate with players worldwide, and engage in resource trading. Together, dominate the prehistoric lands!

• Authentic Experience: Dive into accurate dino depictions. From their looks to sounds, experience realism like never before!

Unearth the mysteries, face ancient challenges, and rise as the ultimate dinosaur in Dinosaur RPG - Dino Survival Simulator Survivor.
70010000087562.intro: Survive the Past! Unleash prehistoric power evolve, explore, conquer!
70010000087562.name: Dinosaur RPG - Dino Survival Simulator Survivor

70010000090198.description:
Take Your Skills to New Heights in High Cars 2!

Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride in High Cars 2! Take control of a variety of unlockable cars as you tackle 40 thrilling tracks across 4 worlds—each designed to test your precision, speed, and driving skills on sky-high courses.

Game Features:

40 Challenging Tracks: Race through tight turns, steep climbs, and daring drops. Each track offers unique layouts, hazards, and moving obstacles that keep every level exciting.

Unlock New Cars: Save you rewards and unlock a range of new cars, each with its own style.

3-Star System: Achieve up to 3 stars on each level by beating the target time! Push for a perfect score by balancing speed and precision to cross the finish line in record time.

High-Altitude Thrills: Feel the rush as you navigate through tracks suspended in the sky, challenging your driving skills with great views and hair-raising turns.

Are you ready to conquer every course, unlock every car, and prove yourself as the ultimate high-altitude racer in High Cars 2?
70010000090198.name: High Cars 2

70010000069877.description:
In Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind, the team faces off against a robotic reincarnation of the Power Rangers' long-time nemesis. Robo Rita has conjured a portal to send herself back in time so she can finally vanquish the Power Rangers by forming an alliance with her younger self. Working together, Robo Rita and Rita Repulsa rewind, rewrite, and remix the past in an attempt to stop the very formation of the Power Rangers, altering the course of history.

Will the two Ritas and their army of monstrous enemies from across the MMPR timeline finally succeed in destroying the Power Rangers? Or will these teenagers with attitude learn to work together and counter this catastrophic chronological collaboration?

Players will be able to experience the origins of the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers again – for the first time! The past will never be the same…

FEATURES

- Classic 90's look and feel with hand-drawn pixel art
- Fan-favorite enemies pulled from different seasons of the hit tv show
- Events and episodes that players remember from the show have been remixed
- Action-packed, 2-D brawler gameplay with arcade-style shooting and driving sequences
- Pilot all of the original Dinozords
- Jump into the cockpit of the legendary Megazord and take down gigantic bosses
70010000069877.intro: See the origin of the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers again – for the first time!
70010000069877.name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind

70010000071002.description:
Celebrate Soul Reaver’s 25th Anniversary
Experience the epic conflict of Kain and Raziel in original form or with remastered graphics.

Included Game Titles
Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver
Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2

Experience the Legendary Narrative
Centuries after your former master, Kain, betrays and executes you, you rise again and embark on a relentless quest for revenge. 

Wield the Powers of a Wraith
Slay your former vampire brethren with your claws, bolts of telekinetic energy, and the elemental Wraith Blade. Grow stronger by devouring the souls of your enemies.

Shift Between Realms
The Elder God has granted you the ability to shift between the Spectral and Material Realms. Traverse the realms to solve puzzles, reveal new paths, and defeat your foes.
70010000071002.intro: Experience the epic conflict of Kain and Raziel in original form or with remastered graphics.
70010000071002.name: Legacy of Kain™ Soul Reaver 1&2 Remastered

70010000083148.description:
This collection offers ten timeless action-themed arcade classics that set milestones for today´s TAITO.

• Bubble Bobble, 1986, action - The original 2 player, co-op arcade version of Bubble Bobble, use your bubble-blowing powers to travel through 100 floors of monsters and rescue your girlfriends!

• Rainbow Islands, 1987, action - Play as Bubby and Bobby in their human forms! Instead of blowing bubbles, rule with rainbows as you climb to your goal!

• Rastan Saga, 1987, action - Guide Rastan the Thief to protect the kingdom of  Ceim, battling enemies and a dragon with your various weapons.

• Dead Connection, 1992, action - 4 detectives battle the mafia in an action-shooting game set in 1950s America, uncovering secrets and pursuing Don Nerozzia!

More games included: Cadash, Rastan Saga 2, Champion Wrestler, Runark, Warrior Blade, Thunder Fox
70010000083148.intro: The third installment in the TAITO Milestones series brings back a diverse selection of ten arcade classics from the 80s and 90s.
70010000083148.name: Taito Milestones 3

70050000051272.name: UFO ROBOT GRENDIZER – The Feast of the Wolves - Princely outfit

70010000041468.description:
Join the nimble Squirrel and the strong Bear on a wild journey. Jump, stomp, zoom through colorful cities following Rascal's clues. Travel Europe with your friends and experience nutastic moments.

JUMP, STOMP, MUNCH! 
Join the nimble Squirrel and the strong Bear. Jump, stomp and munch. Climb famous sights, harvest fruits and nuts. Move trees, trudge through mud or carry giant cakes.

HAVE YOU SEEN RASCAL? 
Follow the clues and embark on an eventful scavenger hunt with Squirrel and Bear. Rascal, the cheeky badger, placed hints all over Europe. Follow the clues and use the help of your animal friends in each country.

DISCOVER THE CULTURES OF EUROPE 
Take your time to explore each city. Learn foreign languages, eat delicious food, collect souvenirs, participate in traditional customs, dress fashionably and recycle trash.

CREATE MEMORIES 
Live in the moment! Gather your friends and family. Grab two controllers. Take photos, document your discoveries and create shared memories!

PLAY ALONE OR TOGETHER 
Let your friends join. Choose between Squirrel and Bear. Combine the strengths of both characters and help each other to succeed on this colorful journey.

PACK YOUR BAGS! 
Travel by bus, train, boat, car, tanker, scooter, airplane, train, or hot air balloon. Play comfortably on your couch at home or take Rascal's Escape with you on the go – it's the perfect travel companion for entertainment with new friends.

Made for Nintendo Switch™
Rascal’s Escape is perfect to bring along on your own journey. Play on the go using the handheld mode. Hand a Joy-Con™ to your friend and play in local co-op with desk mode. Or get comfy on the couch and use the TV mode with either Joy-Con controllers or the Pro Controller. All play styles are fully supported and allow you a colorful journey anytime and everywhere.

Handcrafted by the Good Evil GmbH.
70010000041468.intro: Rascal's Escape is a co-op adventure game to satisfy your wanderlust.
70010000041468.name: Rascal’s Escape

70010000086453.description:
Chubu Centrair International Airport makes its debut in the Airport Hero series, continuing from the Nintendo 3DS™!
Take on the challenge of air traffic control with the limited conditions of a single runway!


■The highest difficulty in the series, MASTER stage, is here!
How to efficiently manage a variety of aircraft with different speeds is the true test of skill!

Not only regular jet airliners, but also slow-moving propeller planes, business jets, and even flight training aircraft performing touch-and-go maneuvers all come into play.
Achieving smooth and safe air traffic control for such a diverse range of aircraft with varying speeds is no easy feat!

Despite this simple airport, the difficulty level as an air traffic control game is top-tier, with many challenging elements throughout the entire scenario!
Among them, the MASTER stage, the highest difficulty in the series, makes its debut!

For fans of 'I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero,' be sure to take on the highly anticipated Centrair, which offers a particularly challenging experience!


■Centrair will mark its 20th anniversary in February 2025!
To celebrate the 20th anniversary of its opening, special gameplay elements have been included!

A guided bus tour around the airport premises is being held at Centrair.
In the game, this bus tour is realistically recreated, giving you the chance to areas typically off-limits and see aircraft approaching up close, anytime you like!

We also have the 'Centrair Archive' where you can learn about the airport facilities, so be sure to enjoy all that Centrair has to offer!
70010000086453.intro: Centrair 20th Anniversary! Tackle the toughest aviation puzzles with the special 'I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero' game,  in collaboration with Centrair!
70010000086453.name: I am an Air Traffic Controller AIRPORT HERO Centrair 20TH ANNIVERSARY

70010000055749.description:
Power slide at breakneck speeds through a dynamic & vibrant 2.5D world, brought to life with pixel-perfect visuals. Crank up the volume with a soundtrack featuring banging beats, scorching guitar solos & high octane energy that really bring the heat to Victory Heat Rally.  

Select your star driver and become one with your machine. Challenge yourself & friends-turned-rivals across a variety of game modes. Experience the high-speed action and non-stop drifting thrills either solo or in up to 4-player split screen.

FEATURES:
SELECT YOUR SUPERSTAR – With 12 super-star drivers & their machines to choose from, who will you blaze a path to victory with?

SOLO OR AGAINST FRIENDS – Go for the gold in the extensive single-player championship, jump in for a quick-fire Arcade Grand Prix, race against up to 3 friends, or take on the time trial mode and set some new world records.

WORLD TOUR – Victory Heat Rally features dozens of stages across 12 unique environments. From the sun-drenched beaches of Baytona Beach to the glacial tundras of Frostbite Harbor, you’ll be breaking speed limits across the globe.

STYLE MEETS PERFORMANCE – Express your personal style with exchangeable performance parts & paint jobs, and assemble a ride that feels your own!
70010000055749.intro: Welcome to VHR! Unlock the secrets of speed in this turbocharged neo-super scaler arcade racing experience.
70010000055749.name: Victory Heat Rally

70010000081637.description:
Join the Smoots characters in Smoots Summer Games II, the exciting sequel to Smoots Summer Games! With its charming cartoon style, this arcade game offers thrilling competitions for up to 4 players in local multiplayer. 

Test your skills in a variety of classic events such as the 100m dash, 400m hurdles, javelin throw, and pole vault, while also experiencing new challenges like cycling, archery, weight lifting, equestrian jumping, skeet shooting, canoeing, and climbing.

Features:

- Local Multiplayer: Compete with up to 4 players in local games.
- Variety of Events: Classic and new sports.
- Track & Field: 100m dash, 400m dash, 110m hurdles, 400m hurdles.
- Throws: Javelin throw, hammer throw.
- Jumps: Long jump, high jump, pole vault.
- Swimming: Breaststroke, backstroke.
70010000081637.intro: Join the Smoots and win all the championships in Smoots Summer Games II
70010000081637.name: Smoots Summer Games II

70010000083075.description:
"You will melt away when Spring arrives." The death warrant was suddenly announced by a crow.

The poor snowman now knows that he does not have much time left.

"I... I don't want to melt!"

Snowman rushes his way towards 
the North, looking for a "Sanctuary" where Spring would never arrive.

Will Snowman find his way to the fabled Sanctuary?

------------
This game lets you become a snowman and journey on to fiding its "paradise" up North. On your way there, there are puzzles and
by solving them, the story moves forward. *You can also skip puzzles if you want to

On your way, there are remains of other snowmen that have melted on their way to paradise. By touching those remains, you will be able to see their memories and their lives before they melted away.
70010000083075.intro: A Xmas tale to melt your heart
70010000083075.name: Snowman Story

70010000083324.description:
【Story Mode】
One complete cinematic episode ( x 18 chapters) with a theme of between beauty and ugliness
Use darkly humorous skills to solve difficult social problems in a surreal and comical way.
The story eventually arrives at a forbidden place in the universe, where an epic climax awaits against an ancient demon that manipulates the blood, memories, time, and dimensions of humankind.
・Multiple endings
・Many secret elements
・High difficulty challenge stage

【Character customization】
100 kinds of cats & dogs, and lot of colors to choose from. Dress up cosplay and go on an adventure!
・Player strengthening and development


【Traveling Mode】 (1 ～ 6 min / play, casual rogue-light)
◎<Tourism> (Relax, Exploring, Leisurely Play)
Travel around the world in a relaxed mood, saving animals, searching heartful people and making beautiful souls bloom!
Enjoy the local traditional food and music while thinking about the history of each country.
●<Exorcism> (Exhilarating action battle; Lv.1 ～ Lv.5 High difficulty)
The ego, ignorance, and weakness of the mind that stirs within human beings is clothed in cruelty and attacks as violence! Exorcise the evil that infests society and save the community!

【Festival Mode】 (* bonus content)
■<Board Game>
Become the warden of Purgatory, prevent the escape and invasion of the 12 sinners, and become the guardian gods of the nations of the world (Turn-based x Tower Defense x Cards x Rogue Lite)
◆<Card Deck>
Unlock your favorite cards from over 1,000 cards and create and build your own deck of damage cards by freely dabbling with your own ideas (physical, mental and quantum damage)
▼<City Build>
Become a creative pastry chef in the heavenly realm and feed mankind with delicious and funny civilized sweets and alter the history of the region in a messy way!
70010000083324.intro: A cosmic horror comedy, your buddy goes around the world
70010000083324.name: Paw Paw Destiny

70010000084992.description:
Embark on a Nature-Fueled Adventure: Step into the shoes of Azura, a curious and nature-loving adventurer, as she uncovers the secrets of the mysterious Primalis creatures and their connection to powerful crystals. With a variety of landscapes to explore, puzzles to solve, and creatures to meet, Azura's Crystals offers an immersive experience for players looking to dive into a magical world full of wonder and discovery.
Features:

Story-Driven Exploration: Uncover ancient lore and unravel the mystery of the Primalis through a richly crafted narrative as Azura journeys from lush forests to dangerous caves.

Dynamic Combat System: Battle enemies using a combination of elemental crystal powers. Strategically summon the mighty Vesperians—beings of immense strength—for assistance in both offense and defense.

Crafting and Resource Management: Gather rare resources from your surroundings and craft tools, potions, and upgrades to aid you in your quest. Use them to unlock new abilities and face increasingly tough challenges.

Puzzle-Solving and Ruins Exploration: Test your wit with environmental puzzles and ancient ruins that require a deep understanding of the Primalis and their world to proceed.

Stunning Environments: Journey through a variety of beautifully crafted environments, each with its own unique flora, fauna, and hazards. From serene forests to treacherous caves and forgotten ruins, every location tells part of the story.

Vesperians: Harness the elemental power of the Primalis Crystals to call upon Vesperians, awe-inspiring creatures that help you in combat, research, and even exploration. Each Vesperian offers unique abilities that can be upgraded over time.
70010000084992.intro: Uncover secrets that shape your destiny!!
70010000084992.name: Azura's Crystals

70010000085718.description:
When a friend gets captured, Maki comes to her rescue! Fight your way through five diverse locations with funky fresh minigames, and conquer the dangerous opponents that stand in your way!


FEEL THE 90S IN AN ANIMAL STYLE — Maki: Paw of Fury’s combat elements are inspired by the hit beat ‘em up arcade games from the 90s, while the story of Maki takes place in the original world of Pangea. Animals rule here, and they’re passionate about sports, technology, and lifelong friendships. Speaking of, one is about to be on the brink of breaking!


A FRIEND IN NEED, A FIGHT INDEED — Maki gets a pleading call for help and realizes that his dear friend - Mapu - has betrayed him. Here starts the road of Maki: The Paw of Fury! He might look adorable, but don’t mistake his fox cuteness for weakness - he has studied the martial art of Tsume no Ken and can wield a tuna like a professional.


MAKI ISN’T ALONE — You can choose to play Maki the fox, but you can also choose Tincho, the muscular capybara, and Maka, the colorful otter who will show your enemies the power of music. Each of these characters is unique when it comes to looks, strength, and fighting style!


VIBE WITH THE MUSIC AND THE WONDERFUL WORLD OF PANGEA — While all the fighting’s going on it’s hard to appreciate the visuals. But if you stand down just for a moment you’ll be able to appreciate the stunning views of Pangea’s world! You’’ travel through dark ninja forests, icy planes, and desert dunes in the tune of energetic and fighting-ready tracks.
70010000085718.intro: Beat ‘em up and Retro Arcade game enjoyers – welcome to the world of Pangea!
70010000085718.name: Maki: Paw of Fury

70010000086710.description:
FIVE-IN-ONE
Riki 8bit Game Collection is not just one experience, but many. To be precise, it includes five unique games and music albums. Kira Kira Star Night lets you collect stars while running through a pixelated, surreal cityscape. In Astro Ninja Man DX, you defend against threats from above by shooting upwards—just like in the classic arcade games of the 70s and 80s. And the trilogy of albums—8bit Music Power, 8bit Music Power Final, and 8bit Music Power Encore—will stay with you long after you turn off the power.

LEGENDARY COMPOSERS GALORE
More than anything, Riki 8bit Game Collection is a chance for some of the gaming world’s most legendary musicians to return to their 80s roots, create new chiptune music, and squeeze out every last drop of screeching 8-bit power from one of the most beloved eras in gaming history. Among the lineup of close to 40 brilliant composers for this collection, you'll find Yuzo Koshiro (Streets of Rage, ActRaiser, The Revenge of Shinobi), Manami Matsumae (Mega Man), Manabu Namiki (Battle Garegga, DoDonPachi Resurrection, Mushihimesama), Soichi Terada (Ape Escape), and Junya Nakano (Final Fantasy X, Tobal). And that’s just a few!

A BLAST FROM THE PAST
Ask yourself this. (Honestly!) Don’t you wish you could travel back to that magical 8-bit era of the 80s? A time when everything was simpler, brighter, and more colorful. When pixel artists crafted game characters dot-by-dot, and musical magicians transformed beeps and blips into soulful, timeless melodies—the very soundtrack of our youth. With the old-school arcade games and irresistibly catchy music albums contained within Riki 8bit Game Collection, that dream of the past becomes a reality!

Simply put, it's an adventure like no other. It’s a chance to see the world through the eyes of the famous manga artist Riki. To feel the pulse of the past and a groove long forgotten. Experience the Riki 8bit Game Collection. Today.
70010000086710.name: RIKI 8Bit GAME Collection

70010000088206.description:
It’s Christmas time, and following the annual tradition, it’s time for Santa's Icy Realm to be in full steam!

Join the festive fun and search for all the Hidden Cats - one by one among the elves to colour the town, piece by piece!

Play through different modes, find special cats, and unlock bonus levels!

Features:
- 900+ hidden cats... and other things to find!
- Two main game modes – normal and advanced
- Six unlockable bonus levels
- A massive snowball fight at the end!
70010000088206.intro: Mew-rry Christmas, everyone – come look for cats in a festive little town!
70010000088206.name: Hidden Cats in Santa's Realm

70010000089308.description:
An exciting challenge awaits you, where attentiveness and observation will become your best allies!

You are given two similar images, and you have to find 10 differences between them. Discover a variety of pictures from a variety of topics: nature, cities, animals, fantasy worlds and much more.

Various images
The game offers a variety of unique and bright pictures, which will allow you to enjoy the game without repeating yourself. Each new image gives a fresh challenge!

Exciting levels
As you progress through the game, the difficulty level gradually increases. The further you go, the more attentive and focused you need to be.

Development of attention
The game is not only entertaining, but also helps develop attention, concentration and observation skills - an ideal workout for the mind!

Are you ready to test your observation skills and solve exciting visual riddles? Dive into the world of riddles and become a master of spotting the differences!
70010000089308.intro: Classic puzzle with finding differences - show all your attentiveness and ingenuity to find all the differences in the pictures!
70010000089308.name: Spot The Difference: Classic Finding Puzzle

70010000089501.description:
Join the Celebration! In Meow Moments: Celebrating Renewal and Romance, cats and friends come together to commemorate special occasions in two vibrant scenes that capture the warmth of new beginnings and heartfelt connections. Every corner is filled with details that spark the imagination, inspiring you to create your own stories around the lively moments you find.

Begin with the electrifying New Year’s Eve on Rio’s famous Copacabana Beach, where stunning artwork by Katia Numakura brings the festivities to life. With fireworks lighting up the sky, crowds of cats and friends enjoy the vibrant beach atmosphere. 
Then, step into a cozy Valentine's Day scene set in a beautiful, romantic square where couples and friends celebrate love and friendship.

Features:

- Cats and Friends: Find delightful characters amid two detailed scenes, each full of unique stories waiting to be uncovered.
- Balloon-Popping Fun: Enjoy relaxing gameplay as you pop balloons across the scenes—a bit of fun with every search!
- Rich Details: Explore beautifully crafted illustrations filled with festive decorations, bringing each celebration to life.
- Atmospheric Soundtrack: Get immersed in the mood with Tatyana Jacques’ exclusive soundtracks that match each scene, from beachy bossa nova to romantic melodies.
- Family-Friendly Fun: With cozy and entertaining gameplay suited for all ages, it’s an experience everyone can enjoy together. Don’t be surprised if the whole family starts pointing out the cats at once!

Join the cats and celebrate renewal and romance in this heartwarming adventure, perfect for cozy game lovers!
70010000089501.intro: Join cute cats in festive scenes! Find feline friends and pop balloons as you explore New Year's on Copacabana beach and share sweet moments for Valentine’s Day.
70010000089501.name: Meow Moments: Celebrating Renewal & Romance

70010000089580.description:
"Are you afraid that if you wake up you won't recognize your life, but forever remember the dream you lived?"

Timore Narhelma is a surreal experience about human mind and horrors within. The text on the screen is asking you various questions, that all have a connection to your being, yet they don't seem similar on their own. You get to experience a fraction of your mind being tested, and you get to choose your answers. Probably.

This test also puts you in unique situations, asking you to show what would you do in the specific scenarios. Would you approach the horrors yourself, who would you kill, would you let go of your mind, body and your eyes? The game is a combination of a horror-test and 3D exploration of various environments, connecting the story together. You get asked various questions about the human nature, about yourself, and as the game progresses you get to know more about the character that you're controlling. Some answers are showing you what the character in the game might be thinking, even if you don't choose those answers. You're also going to meet a few known characters from Timore series. It's a unique approach to story-telling, and a surreal experience overall, leading you towards one specific goal. Choose your answers, prove them with your actions. Explore the surreal environments and characters living inside of them as you get closer to the city of Narhelma.
70010000089580.intro: Timore Narhelma is a surreal experience about human mind and horrors within.
70010000089580.name: TIMORE NARHELMA

70010000089998.description:
"Proceed with extreme caution. Many dangers might be ahead. These include: creatures, demons, anomalies, ghosts, ancients, beasts, aliens, curses, malfunctions, ascendants, diseases, darkness and death. Your task is to find the smiling pictures. Desmile them. You will not be let back in until your task is complete. Begin."

SMILE SIMULATION is a surreal horror game where you are closed in a dangerous environment, with many rooms and corridors, as well as monsters and curses trying to kill you. Find the pictures on the walls that are smiling, the "Desmile" button turns them back to normal.

You'll find the previous explorer's voice logs - Brian was here some time ago, when the simulation appeared in the Lacrimosa facility. The Smile Simulation appears to have a voice of a woman named Vivian too, who's guiding you, but you're not sure where just yet.

Explore the horrors of this place, find the smiling pictures, avoid the creatures that each behave in a unique way, the game also features a blinking mechanic that elevates the tension as it affects the creatures following you, and find out the secrets and the story surrounding this threatening place.
70010000089998.intro: Psychological-surreal-analog-survival horror game. Find the smiles and get out.
70010000089998.name: SMILE SIMULATION

70010000090564.description:
For some mysterious reason, the protagonist finds himself in sealed rooms wherever he goes.
Seemingly simple at first, solving the puzzles delivers an unmatched sense of satisfaction.

    Episode 2
The stage is set in a quiet residential area's old, abandoned school building. Sneaking in for a ghost-hunting thrill, the protagonist suddenly finds himself locked inside!
Rumored to be haunted, a thrilling escape is about to begin from this schoolhouse in a remote corner of the world.

Featuring fully refined graphics, immersive interactive elements, and various play modes with multiple endings, this game promises a unique experience for every player. With memo and camera functions at your fingertips, it’s designed to be easy for beginners and exciting for veterans alike. Dive into the world of simple yet addictive puzzle-solving with this thrilling escape game!
70010000090564.intro:
Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 2: Escape from The Old School Building!
70010000090564.name: The Escape Room Chronicles ep2:The Old School Building

70050000049736.description:
When transported to an unknown dimension, Shadow must race through the streets of modern-day Shibuya to defeat the forces of G.U.N.
 
Take on a new look as Shadow and play through a unique level inspired by the new movie, Sonic the Hedgehog 3, featuring the voice of Keanu Reeves!

©2024 Par. Pics. ©2024 SEGA. TOKYO SKYTREE®. All Rights Reserved.
70050000049736.name: SONIC X SHADOW GENERATIONS: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Movie Pack

70050000051057.description: Ticket to Ride: Switzerland includes a Board, 2 characters, 2 locomotives and 2 carriages.
70050000051057.name: Ticket to Ride: Switzerland

70010000082891.description:
“FAIRY TAIL 2” is a new RPG based on the popular magical combat fantasy manga and anime series “FAIRY TAIL,” whose story is beloved by fans around the world, with the original manga selling more than 72 million copies worldwide. This sequel to the game "FAIRY TAIL," released in July 2020, depicts the “Alvarez Empire Arc,” the climax of the original manga.

- Relive the culmination of the original series through gameplay!
This RPG depicts the dramatic developments of the “Alvarez Empire Arc,” the climax of the original story. Playing as the main characters Natsu and Lucy and other members of the Fairy Tail guild, you can relive the epic battles against their greatest enemy, Emperor Spriggan (Zeref) of the Alvarez Empire, along with his elite team, called the "Spriggan 12," and the world destroyer, Black Dragon Acnologia.

- Flashy magic battles with unique characters!
The battle system has been completely redesigned from the previous game, resulting in real-time battles that are even more flashy and impactful. Use various strategic elements to your advantage and experience the thrill of exhilarating battles!

- Seamlessly explore the final battlefield of the Kingdom of Fiore!
The world of “FAIRY TAIL” has been recreated with beautiful 3D graphics that allow you to feel immersed in the world of the original series as if you were exploring it yourself!

- An abundance of exclusive in-game content, including an original epilogue!
Explore a new original story, "Key to the Unknown," set after the events of this arc and the original series. Plus, you can get to know new sides of your favorite characters in “Character Stories” and experience a variety of other elements that can only be seen in the game!

Note:
- Please see the official site for more details.
- There are other editions that include this product. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.
70010000082891.intro: The final battle of FAIRY TAIL is about to begin
70010000082891.name: FAIRY TAIL 2

70010000083179.description:
Chernobylite is a Science Fiction Survival Horror RPG from developers The Farm 51. Venture into the wasteland of Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone, as Igor, a physicist and ex-employee of the Chernobyl Power Plant. Return to Pripyat to investigate the mysterious disappearance of your fiancée, 30 years after the infamous disaster.

Battle it out with hostile military forces, other scavengers, mutated creatures, and the harsh irradiated environment. Experience an adventure of survival, conspiracy, horror, love, and obsession where your choices impact the story.

Chernobylite Complete Edition is the full base game + all free content updates to date, including extra story missions, new locations, additional weapons, unique game modes and more.

BASE BUILDING & CRAFTING
Build and customize your home base to serve all your operations and expeditions. Expand and upgrade to suit your needs and those of your companions. Use workstations to craft powerful gadgets, traps, and weapons, or fine-tune your existing gear to gain an edge in your excursions.

RESOURCE & TEAM MANAGEMENT
Recruit a diverse group of skilled companions to join you on your journey. Assign them to missions to gather resources, scout new areas, or eliminate threats. Manage your base to meet their needs and keep morale high, all while making tough story choices that will shape their loyalty to you.

STEALTH, SURVIVAL & COMBAT
Survival in The Exclusion Zone is tough, as each day brings fresh challenges and diminishing supplies. Venture out on supply runs, use stealth to evade detection, or engage in intense combat when necessary. Navigate through perilous environments and face formidable enemies, all while ensuring you extract back to base to keep your scavenged loot.

NON-LINEAR STORYTELLING & CHOICES
No playthrough is the same. Your choices and actions shape your story, but no decision will satisfy everyone. Choose carefully whom to trust, whether to prioritize resources for survival or research and when to face conflicts head-on or avoid them. Every decision carries weight and leads to different outcomes.
70010000083179.intro: Chernobylite is a non-linerar, science-fiction survival horror RPG. Explore the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone and uncover the truth of your tortured past.
70010000083179.name: Chernobylite Complete Edition

70010000085125.description:
Neon Beats is a 2D side view platformer game in which the player will evolve in different levels that are rhythmed by catchy musics.

Complete levels as quickly as possible!
Gather several hidden collectibles!
Brave different challenging obstacles!

In Neon Beats, you will find :
• 8 different levels with it's own music
• Rhythm based gameplay
• A character with smooth and responsive controls
• Simple and elegant neon ambiance
• Several challenging level elements
• Hidden collectibles adding instruments to the music
• A score system based on your time, collectibles and deaths
70010000085125.intro: Beat your best scores in Neon Beats, a 2D platformer game with rhythm based levels!
70010000085125.name: Neon Beats

70010000087475.description:
Step into the demanding role of a Border Patrol officer in Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024, an immersive and highly realistic simulation game where the stakes are high and every decision shapes the outcome.Every day brings new challenges, from detecting hidden contraband to engaging in high-speed pursuits, as you work to secure the border against illegal activities. Use advanced equipment, trust your instincts, and make split-second decisions in a world of smuggling, corruption, and high-risk encounters.

Key Features

- Realistic Border Environment: Patrol a meticulously designed border landscape, from remote checkpoints to urban entry points, each presenting unique obstacles and threats.

- Interactive Vehicle Searches: Conduct in-depth vehicle inspections with specialized tools to uncover hidden compartments and concealed contraband, testing your attention to detail.

- Real-time Document Verification: Check visitor documents and spot subtle signs of forgery or expired permits, with increasing pressure as lines grow and tensions rise.

- Diverse Missions: Tackle a variety of tasks—from routine inspections to action-packed chases—as you enforce law and order across multiple terrain types.

- Choice-Driven Outcomes: Every decision you make, from arrests to negotiations, shapes the storyline and the future of your border post.

   Are you ready to uphold the law and face the daily dangers of border control? Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024 challenges you to outsmart the smugglers and protect the frontier at all costs.
70010000087475.intro: Guard the border - Uncover lies, stop the contraband, and uphold the law.
70010000087475.name: Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024

70010000088306.description:
Ninja 1987 is an action platformer in the classic 8-bit style, paying homage to the great ninja games of the past. 

Take a nostalgic dive into the 80s with pixel art graphics and chiptune music that captures the vintage sound. Ninja 1987 features 7 levels filled with enemies and traps. Our hero can wield shurikens and unleash powerful ninjitsu attacks. 

Encounter challenging end-level bosses and in-game screens that unfold the story while remaining true to the totally arcade gameplay of the 80s.

Features: 
- 7 levels with 7 powerful bosses!
- Graphics and Music in full 8-bit style!
Devastating Ninja techniques to use!
- 80s B-movie style story!
- Side-scrolling action-platformer
70010000088306.intro: Save the city like a ninja!
70010000088306.name: Ninja 1987

70010000089988.description:
Get ready to explore the Big Apple like never before in Monkey Kong in New York! Step into the shoes of Monkey Kong, a daring ape on a mission to conquer New York’s most iconic locations—from the peaceful greenery of Central Park to the historic streets of Harlem, the dizzying heights of Manhattan’s skyline, and even the bustling New York Harbor.

Collect golden bananas scattered throughout each area, gaining incredible powers that make you faster, stronger, and unstoppable. But stay alert—tricky obstacles and mischievous rival monkeys stand in your way! With every banana, Monkey Kong gains new abilities.

Can you help Monkey Kong become the king of the city’s urban jungle? Traverse each unique area, dodge barrels, avoid rival monkeys, and make your mark in Monkey Kong in New York!

Key Features:

Iconic New York Locations: Adventure through Central Park’s shaded paths, Harlem’s lively streets, the skyscrapers of Manhattan, and the bustling harbor with breathtaking views.

Banana Power-Ups: Collect golden bananas to unlock powers like super strength, helping you overcome new challenges and rivals.

Challenging Obstacles & Rivals: Face off against rival monkeys and dodge obstacles like swinging cranes, slippery docks, and barrels in your path.

Beautiful City Graphics: Each location is carefully crafted to capture the spirit of New York, bringing Monkey Kong’s adventure to life with stunning detail.
70010000089988.name: Monkey Kong In New-York

70050000052589.description: Journey into Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone with The Art of Chernobylite, a digital artbook from developers, The Farm 51. In the artbook you’ll find concept artwork of characters, locations, weapons, and monsters, as well as 3D scans and real-world photography from Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone.

70050000052590.description:
Get a deeper appreciation for the haunting and atmospheric sounds of Chernobylite with the complete soundtrack by award-winning composer Mikolai Stroiński.

The Chernobylite Zone Bard Pack allows you to customize the music in your hideout to match your mood. Choose freely from the full official soundtrack and exclusive compositions created specifically for your journey in the Exclusion Zone.

70050000052591.description: A collection of unique skins to customize every weapon type in the game. Enhance your arsenal with a variety of styles, from elegant white roses and radioactive sinister smiles to icy blue finishes. A touch of style can remind us of our humanity, even this twisted wasteland.
70050000052591.intro: Collection of unique skins to customize your entire arsenal of weapons.
70050000052591.name: Chernobylite - Seasoned Scavenger Weapon Skin Pack

70050000052592.description: Collection of unique skins to customize the look and feel of your base/hideout. Choose to add some calming blue glow to any part of your craftable base items, or maybe some imposing 1980s industrial-style smoke-spewing machinery. Want something a little more natural? Opt for a rustic red, wooden look inspired by the Red Forest from the real-life Chernobyl Exclusion Zone.
70050000052592.intro: Collection of unique skins to customize the look and feel of your base.
70050000052592.name: Chernobylite - Irradiated Hideout Skin Pack

This sequel to the game "FAIRY TAIL," released in July 2020, depicts the “Alvarez Empire Arc,” the climax of the original manga.

This set includes:

- Lucy Outfit (GUST Collaboration): "Ryza 1"
A Lucy-specific outfit based on the clothing of the "Atelier Ryza" protagonist Ryza.

70070000025531.description:
Grab your bricks, get building, and race to the finish line before your rivals even lay their first stone! Collect bricks of your color and build your bridge to the next level. Got some extra bricks? Use them to expand your castle and unlock quirky new brick designs!

Features:
- 7 additional skins to show off your style!
- 25000 coins to help you on your journey!
- Build across endless levels of fun!
- Customize your bricks and character for a unique look!
- Expand your castle with extra bricks!
- Challenge yourself in epic bonus and boss stages!

Want to slow the competition down? No problem! Trip them up and zoom ahead to claim first place. Crush those bonus levels to stack up coins, and then use them to unlock new skins and colors to show off your style!

Outbuild, outsmart, and outlast the competition—who knew building bridges could be this much fun?
70070000025531.intro: Build your way to victory, one brick at a time!
70070000025531.name: Bridge Race: Complete Edition

70010000088016.description: Chaos has taken over the pasture! Take on this addictive challenge where you need to help the farm animals find their pairs and escape the pen. Move cows, piglets, sheep, and more, organising them to free up space and ensure everyone gets out happy. But keep an eye on the unpaired animals, if any of them can’t find their way home, it’s game over! With puzzles growing more challenging, you’ll need strategy and agility to keep the farm in order. Can you solve these puzzles before chaos takes over?
70010000088016.name: Farm

70010000089203.description:
Dive deep into a vibrant underwater world in Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG! Embark on an epic adventure as a small fish with a big destiny. Explore stunning coral reefs, vast oceans, and winding rivers as you evolve into a powerful and majestic creature.
Features:
- Evolve & Adapt: Transform from minnow to legend, unlocking powerful abilities. Choose your playstyle: predator or survivor.
- Build Your Community: Rescue fish, forge alliances, and create a thriving underwater society.
- Explore Diverse Biomes: Dive into stunning Coral Reefs, vast Oceans, and winding Rivers. Each with unique challenges and secrets.
- Race for Glory: Test your speed and agility in thrilling underwater races!
- Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in a captivating underwater world brought to life.
- Endless Discovery: Uncover secrets, encounter fascinating creatures, and forge your own path.
   With Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG , you’re not just playing a game; you’re diving into a captivating journey where you can explore, survive, and thrive in an extraordinary underwater universe. Are you ready to take the plunge? The ocean is calling—your adventure awaits!
70010000089203.intro: Join the ultimate aquatic journey where survival is just the beginning!
70010000089203.name: Aquatic Life: Fish Simulator RPG

70010000046031.description:
Leif's Adventure is a captivating 2D action-adventure game centered on friendship and teamwork. A young boy, never meant to be a hero, discovers that brute strength isn't always the solution. Guide two distinct characters through the adventure of their lifetimes, leveraging their unique abilities to defeat the evil forces of the Netherworld.

Key Features:
* Exploration and Adventure: Navigate through a richly diverse world, exploring six unique realms filled with side-quests, hidden treasures and colorful characters, each with their own background story. Battle a variety of creatures, powerful secret bosses, and other deadly adversaries. Use Ghost's supernatural talents alongside Leif's physical abilities to delve into the deepest reaches of each realm.

* Singleplayer and Co-op: Play Leif's Adventure in single-player mode or switch to local co-op mode at any time and play together with a friend. Leif excels in fighting, jumping, and running, while Ghost can find hidden areas, activate ethereal objects and platforms, collect items, and stun enemies.

* Extensive Weapon Selection: Equip Leif with a wide range of weapons including swords, hammers, axes, and spears. Collect and use weapons dropped by enemies. Each weapon is imbued with unique elemental abilities like fire, ice, and electricity.

* Skill Progression: Enhance Leif's abilities with a variety of skills such as meteor-strike, air attack, and weapon throws. Upgrade weapons, including his signature hammer, and maximize his health.

* Hand-Drawn Art: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted world with unique hand-drawn graphics inspired by Nordic folklore.
70010000046031.intro: Join Leif and his loyal sidekick Ghost as they combine their strengths to overcome the sinister forces of the Netherworld.
70010000046031.name: Leif's Adventure: Netherworld Hero

70010000077897.description:
Dive into a frosty world packed with snow-filled challenges and chilly adventures designed to bring warmth and excitement to your cold winter days. From snowball battles to icy races, there’s something for everyone to enjoy solo or with family and friends.

Take on the leaderboard to see who can claim the highest score by challenging your friends in the multiplayer mode — up to 8 players can join by simply passing around one controller. With a delightful mix of arcade-inspired games like Tetrice, Polar Cross, Frostbreaker, and Winter Match 3, this collection offers countless hours of fun.

WINTER WONDERLAND BY TRAIN – Hop on a magical train ride that takes you through snowy landscapes, stopping at every station for a new game.

WINTER-THEMED GAME MODES – From high-speed bobsled relays to precision snowball throws, each game captures the festive spirit of the winter season.

ADORABLE CHARACTERS – Choose from 8 unique, winter-loving characters to add personality to every game.

MULTIPLAYER FUN FOR ALL – Play alone or with up to 8 players by passing a single controller — challenge your friends and set the highest scores!

Games Included:
• Bobsleigh Relay
• Chilly Slices
• Snowball Blast
• Tetrice
• Arctic Circle Skater
• Frostbreaker
• Snowdrift Racers
• Winterpong
• And many more!
70010000077897.intro: Get ready for endless winter fun with a fantastic collection of arcade-inspired games!
70010000077897.name: Winter Games Collection

70010000088026.description:
Fulfill Your Wish
You’ve been brought back with a single purpose: revenge. Attack the villages ravaged by the sinister and enslaving “Apocalypse Bringers”, who have plunged the world into chaos, and liberate them from their tyranny.

Stealthy Action and Multiple Tools
Use your bow and arrow to eliminate enemies from a distance. You can distract foes with an arrow and attack them from behind, or wait and confront them head-on with lethal axe strikes.

Confront the “Apocalypse Bringers”
Liberate villages from their control and face their bosses. Each boss has unique mechanics that will alter your gameplay. Who knows? Maybe you can even save some of them.

Immersive Open World
Explore the desert’s stories, complete missions for upgrades, and uncover the darkest secrets, shrouded in blood and sand.
70010000088026.intro: After you die, Death gives you the chance to come back to the world of the living to fulfill your deepest desire. Take the chance and claim your revenge
70010000088026.name: Brothers in Hell

70010000088059.description:
For some mysterious reason, the protagonist finds himself in sealed rooms wherever he goes.
Seemingly simple at first, solving the puzzles delivers an unmatched sense of satisfaction.

    Episode 3
This adventure takes place in everyone's dream destination—a tropical island resort!
The protagonist arrives for a getaway with their uncle, ready to soak up the sun. But on the way to the hotel shuttle, something goes wrong and he finds himself locked in his room, unable to leave!
Far from home in a secluded corner of paradise, this escape drama is about to unfold.

Featuring fully refined graphics, immersive interactive elements, and various play modes with multiple endings, this game promises a unique experience for every player. With memo and camera functions at your fingertips, it’s designed to be easy for beginners and exciting for veterans alike. Dive into the world of simple yet addictive puzzle-solving with this thrilling escape game!
70010000088059.intro:
Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 3: Escape from The Southern Resort!
70010000088059.name: The Escape Room Chronicles ep3:The Southern Resort

70010000088119.description:
Kaimyou is ...

Kaimyou is a posthumous name given to a deceased person in Buddhist tradition, particularly in Japan. It is used during memorial services and placed on the Ihai (memorial tablet) in honor of the deceased. The Kaimyou represents the individual’s spiritual journey and is usually bestowed by a Buddhist priest. The name often reflects the person’s virtues or spiritual aspirations, and its creation follows specific religious customs. The use of Kaimyou is common in rituals surrounding death, mourning, and the afterlife, and it plays a significant role in the commemoration of ancestors.

This software automatically generates Kaimyou (posthumous Buddhist names).
*Please note that while the term 'Kaimyou' is used as a general reference, in the software, the name may be referred to as 'Houmyou,' 'Hougou,' 'Myougou,' 'Okurina,' or other terms depending on the Buddhist sect.

This comprehensive Kaimyou editing tool is suitable not only for those who wish to receive a Kaimyou for themselves or their family members, but also for use by Buddhist priests. Additionally, since Japanese religions are tolerant, the software can be used by individuals from other religions without any issue. Even if you simply want a cool Kanji alias, you are welcome to use it.



Main Features

■ Automatic Kaimyou Generation
By simply answering questions and inputting the following profile information—name, gender, age, sect, level of faith, occupation, hobbies, skills, and motto—the Kaimyou will be automatically generated.

■ Flexible Editing
You can freely modify the automatically generated Kaimyou. Changes can be made at the Kanji level while checking their meanings, allowing you to receive a Kaimyou that meets your preferences.

■ Kaimyou Certificate Issuance
Once you have your favorite Kaimyou, you can issue a certificate. The certificate can be saved in an album, enabling you to transfer it to other devices or print it for use.

■ As an Ihai
By switching your Nintendo Switch™ to tabletop mode, it can be used as an Ihai. The Ihai is a memorial tablet that represents the deceased.

■ Temple Member Management
The software includes a temple member management feature, allowing you to manage multiple individuals’ names, ages, sects, and more. This makes it highly recommended for clergy who need to manage Kaimyou for multiple people.

■ Supported Sects
・Jōdo-shū / SeizanJōdo-shū / JōdoShin-shū / ShinshūTakada-Ha
・Nichiren-shū / NichirenSei-shū
・Sōtō-shū / Rinzai-shū / Ōbaku-shū
・Shingon-shū / Tendai-shū / YūzūNembutsu-shū
・Ji-shū
・Ritsu-shū
・Shinto
・No religion / Unknown
70010000088119.intro: This is a tool that automatically generates, manages, and edits Kaimyou. It can also issue Kaimyou certificates and save them in an album, and it can be used as an Ihai.
70010000088119.name: Kaimyou Maker

70010000090709.description:
Super Spy Raccoon is an imagining of a stealth game as an early 80's Arcade Classic! Your mission, if you choose to accept it, is to acquire all classified documents as you venture deeper and deeper into enemy territory. Hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory! YOU MUST NOT BE SEEN! Do you have the skills to top score?

What to expect

- 5 single-screen levels that loop until a kill screen!
- Challenging yet addictive arcade style fun
- Short wait-times to get right back into the action!
- Unlockable suit colors to match your sense of style
- Local and global leaderboards for increased bragging rights!
70010000090709.intro: A retro arcade throwback where you hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory! YOU MUST NOT BE SEEN! Do you have the skills to top score?
70010000090709.name: Super Spy Raccoon

70050000050113.description: Prepare to embark on a tropical adventure with Monster Jam™ Showdown - Aloha Expansion. This DLC pack features a new environment with 6 new tracks and 1 new arena, plus 5 fearless trucks.
70050000050113.name: Monster Jam™ Showdown - Aloha Expansion

70050000051359.description:
Find out what happens after Soohee Pyeon's ending

Before I knew it, it had been a year since I'd met Soohee.
As if fate were guiding our actions, we all ended up back at the convenience store.
The reason: the store, relationships, and Some Some...
70050000051359.name: Some Some Convenience Store - Soohee After Story

70010000088575.description:
Get ready to soar into high-octane aircraft combat, where fast-paced flight simulation meets strategic warfare. As a skilled pilot, you’ll navigate various combat zones, engage in intense air battles, and take on high-stakes missions to become the ultimate ace. Whether you're racing against the clock, battling waves of enemies, or customizing your aircraft for optimal performance, each mode offers unique challenges and action-packed gameplay. The game’s dynamic environments, from bustling cities to vast open skies, will test your reflexes and tactical skills.

Key Features:

- Campaign Mode: Engage in high-stakes missions, facing diverse enemy forces and unlocking special rewards.

- Time Assault: Take down as many enemies as possible within a time limit, with bonuses based on your speed and precision.

- Survival Mode: Stay airborne, evade attacks, and outlast foes to rack up a high score.

- Customizable Aircraft: Equip and upgrade three advanced planes to tailor your playstyle for the ultimate experience.

- Diverse Weapons: Arm your aircraft with a variety of weapons, including air-to-air missiles, air-to-ship rockets, and air-to-ground bombs, each designed for specific combat scenarios.

- Diverse Environments: Conquer various battlefields, each offering unique terrains, weather conditions, and strategic challenges.

Master the skies and prove your aerial prowess in this exhilarating flight experience. Join the fight and elevate your gaming adventure to new heights!
70010000088575.intro: Your Sky, Your Rules: Experience the Ultimate Aerial Combat!
70010000088575.name: Fighter Aces: Sky Dominance

70010000087058.description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor, where each wave can bring new adventures or deadly threats. Stranded on a fragile raft with only a hook, you must gather resources, battle fierce predators, and transform your raft into a secure floating haven. Survive alone or with friends on this treacherous ocean quest!
Key Features:
	•	Survive Shark Attacks: Defend yourself against relentless shark threats. Fortify your raft and stay one step ahead!
	•	Resource Crafting: Collect resources to build essential tools and upgrade your raft into a secure oasis.
	•	Hook Mastery: Use your hook to snag drifting debris and vital supplies—each catch is a step toward survival.
	•	Raft Expansion: Upgrade and personalize your floating base with new sections and decorative touches.
	•	Fishing & Cooking: Catch fish and cook meals to stay energized on your journey.
	•	Water Filtration: Convert seawater into drinkable fresh water to keep hydrated.
	•	Island Exploration: Discover new islands, unearth civilization remnants, and gather valuable resources.
Will you survive the dangers of the ocean and build a thriving sanctuary, or will the waves claim your fate? The ocean adventure of a lifetime awaits in Float Survival Simulator: Ocean Survivor!
70010000087058.intro: Survive the waves, outsmart the predators.
70010000087058.name: Float Survival Simulator - Ocean Survivor

70010000088811.description:
Match three blocks of the same color to clear levels and build amazing structures for your blocks. Sounds easy? Think again! – you only have so much room on your bench, and if you overfill it, it's game over!

Every level gives you new challenges to solve, but don't worry – you have power-ups to help! Undo a move, reshuffle blocks, or add extra bench space when you're in a tough spot. Earn coins along the way to customize your blocks and make your diorama totally unique!

For an extra challenge, try "Bus Mode" – the classic Block Jam experience with a colorful twist! Match blocks to fill color-coded buses and watch them roll out. Complete all buses in a level, and you'll earn even more power-ups and coins to help you on your journey!

Features:
- Match and Win: Match three blocks of the same color to clear levels and avoid overfilling your bench.
- Limited Bench: Use your bench wisely – a full bench means game over!
- Bus Mode: Fill color-matched buses to clear levels and earn extra power-ups and coins!
- Fun Power-Ups: Use undo, magnet, reshuffle, or expand your bench to escape tricky situations.
- Build Your Diorama: Collect bricks to create unique structures in your very own block-populated diorama.
- Customize Your Blocks: Use coins earned in-game to give your diorama blocks unique and fun looks.

Jump into Block Jam – where every move is a step closer to clearing the board, personalizing your world, and mastering each challenge!
70010000088811.intro: Plan, match, and clear the board in Block Jam, where every move counts and every block needs the perfect match!
70010000088811.name: Block Jam

70010000089177.description:
In Car Cops, you’re more than just a regular cop – you’re the sharp-eyed officer who never misses a clue! Patrol the streets, pull over suspicious drivers, and dive into the action-packed life of a police officer. Each stop could lead to a dangerous criminal, a desperate chase, or someone in need of urgent help.

Check IDs, inspect faces, and scan every detail to decide if the driver is innocent or up to no good. From cutting open seat cushions, to defusing bombs in car trunks, you’ll need to stay alert and rely on your instincts and gear. And when a wanted criminal crosses your path, prepare for a heart-pounding chase – and don’t hesitate to take action when it’s time to draw your weapon!

But it’s not just about the bad guys – you’re there for the people, too. Some drivers might need CPR, others may have a car fire or a breakdown that only you can handle!

Features:
- Detailed Vehicle Inspections: Check IDs, match faces, and look for suspicious items in cars.
- Intense Car Chases: Follow criminals on the run in fast-paced pursuits across town.
- Showdowns with Criminals: Be ready for action when criminals fight back – take cover and return fire to stay safe.
- Professional Police Tools: Use x-rays, slice through seat fabric, and explore every corner of the car for hidden surprises.
- Deliver Justice: Bring suspects to court, where you decide if they’re guilty or innocent.
- Emergency Responder Role: Jump into action, offering CPR, putting out car fires, or helping with breakdowns on the road.

Think you can spot a criminal at first glance? Put your instincts to the test!
70010000089177.intro: From traffic stops to high-speed chases – think you’ve got what it takes to keep the streets safe?
70010000089177.name: Car Cops

70050000053423.description:
With this DLC you'll unlock:

- Harley outfit

- extra 5000 cash to buy furniture and make your home the perfect place to relax after a hard day at work

Unlock 7 unique outfits for your police officer, perfect for every undercover mission or just adding flair to your beat!
70050000053423.intro: Dress up on the job and make your home your own!
70050000053423.name: Car Cops: Drip Patrol

70050000053433.description:

- 15 of each power-up for an easier time!

70050000053433.intro: Boost your game with power-ups and stylish hats!
70050000053433.name: Block Jam: Fancy Power

Get ready to match, clear, and decorate with flair!
70050000053436.intro: Boost your game with power-ups and lovely hats!

70010000088649.description: Tombs of Myra is a turn-based puzzle dungeon crawler game.
70010000088649.intro: Descend into the cursed tombs of Myra and free the souls of ancient warriors.
70010000088649.name: Tombs Of Myra

70010000088805.description:
Step into the role of your favorite heroes and villains from across the history of Star Trek and embark on an epic space adventure to control the mysterious Nexus. Battle to save all of existence in Star Trek’s official strategy-based RPG! 

PREPARE FOR ADVENTURE 
Dive into the action with characters spanning the entire Star Trek universe! Take command of the U.S.S. Artemis and recruit a team of legendary Star Trek characters as you embark on daring missions, experience epic turn-based combat, and make choices that influence the game’s entire story. 

ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM
Ever wanted to master Spock’s Vulcan nerve pinch or battle with Worf’s deadly bat’leth? Now is your chance! Recruit and command over 70 iconic characters from the Star Trek universe including Kirk, Spock, Picard, Janeway, Data, Burnham, Pike, and many more! Send your Star Trek team on critical missions that will test your crew’s skills and ingenuity. Earn special rewards by completing collections of characters based on the Star Trek shows they appeared in or the traits they possess. Plus, you can earn combat bonuses by using multiple Star Trek characters from the same collection in battle. 

TAKE COMMAND OF THE U.S.S. ARTEMIS
Captain the U.S.S. Artemis and shape the fate of the cosmos! Choose your crew strategically. Each Star Trek character has their own specific skills and abilities to help you outwit, overpower and overcome your enemies. Every decision you make could be the difference between triumph and defeat. Take command, Captain – the galaxy awaits your leadership!

NAVIGATE AN IMMERSIVE UNIVERSE
Dive into the exquisitely crafted 3D world of Star Trek Legends! Explore beautifully rendered 3D worlds and interact with fully realized animated characters in this epic Star Trek RPG. 

Get ready to boldly go where no one has gone before in Star Trek: Legends. Your interstellar adventure awaits!
70010000088805.intro: Captain - The fate of the universe is in your hands!
70010000088805.name: Star Trek: Legends

70010000088064.description:
For some mysterious reason, the protagonist finds himself in sealed rooms wherever he goes.
Seemingly simple at first, solving the puzzles delivers an unmatched sense of satisfaction.

    Episode 4
The stage is set in an actual TV studio!
The protagonist is working as an assistant on a variety show featuring a famous host. After filming wraps up and the cast heads to the green room, our protagonist finishes packing up only to find that the studio doors won’t open!
An unexpected escape adventure begins from a world of lights, cameras, and live audiences.

Featuring fully refined graphics, immersive interactive elements, and various play modes with multiple endings, this game promises a unique experience for every player. With memo and camera functions at your fingertips, it’s designed to be easy for beginners and exciting for veterans alike. Dive into the world of simple yet addictive puzzle-solving with this thrilling escape game!
70010000088064.intro:
Discover items and use your wits to solve puzzles in this mystery!
Episode 4: Escape from the TV station!
70010000088064.name: The Escape Room Chronicles ep4:The 24-Hour TV Station

70050000022848.description: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?
70050000022848.name: Empire of Sin - Expansion 2

70010000063182.description:
COMING Q4 2024

Pine is an interactive and emotional short story told wordlessly through hand-drawn animation and music, designed to be played in a single sitting.

It follows the story of a woodworker grieving the recent passing of his wife. Now alone in the glade where they made their home, he attempts to move on.

His simple daily chores of tending to his garden or collecting wood for the next winter are interrupted by memories of the happy times they spent together. Desperate not to forget her, the woodworker captures these memories in beautiful carvings out of the wood he collects.

Pine is a story-driven game focused on accessible, engaging interactions that pull you into the woodworker’s experience. Charming puzzles and mini-games celebrate the happy memories of their time together while deliberate chores underscore his challenges with moving on.

KEY FEATURES
• The Insistence of Memory - As you help the woodworker complete his daily routine, the simple chores you’ll guide him through are interrupted by reminders of his late wife. In these endearing memories you’ll relive their happiest moments together, playing games and building a life with each other. 

• Meticulous Mementoes - The woodworker’s carvings are beloved mementos he captures from his memories. Pine’s unique carving mechanic lets you create the carvings with the woodworker’s hands, each a promise that his lost love will be remembered.

• A Wordless Short Story - Pine is a wordless story, relying on its visuals and sounds to bring you into the woodworker’s world. It is a single-serving game focused on telling a beautiful, emotional tale.

• Lovingly Crafted - Classic hand-drawn animation, a beautiful setting, an evocative score and immersive environmental sound effects bring Pine’s story to life.
70010000063182.intro: A game about life after love
70010000063182.name: Pine: A Story of Loss

70050000043776.description: Contains content for NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS.
70050000043776.name: NBUNSC - DLC Pack 5

70050000045030.description:
Includes playable characters, character costumes, and additional scenarios for use in Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash.

*Please note that this product is included in bundles. Take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
70050000045030.name: Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash - Hidden Inventory/Premature Death

70050000045031.description:
Includes a set of costumes for playable characters that can be used in Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash.

*Please note that this product is included in bundles. Take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
70050000045031.name: Jujutsu Kaisen Cursed Clash - Anime Ending Theme 1 Outfit Set

70050000046101.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.
70050000046101.name: SnowRunner - Season 14: Reap & Sow

70050000047076.description: Expand your Expeditions: A MudRunner Game experience with this new DLC.
70050000047076.name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Season 1

70050000047077.description: Expand your Expeditions: A MudRunner Game experience with this new DLC.
70050000047077.name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Season 2

70010000088490.description:
A fighting game where you can control your reach!?
During a match, you can extend the reach of your weapon in exchange for your own stamina!
Extending your reach makes you more likely to be defeated, but it allows you to instantly overcome situations where you are at a disadvantage in distance!
You can also shorten your extended reach, so use it appropriately depending on the situation!
"Should I extend my reach, even though it makes me more likely to die?"
"Should I conserve my stamina, even though I am at a disadvantage in distance?"
The fun is in being caught between two choices that both seem likely to lead to victory!
The thrill of making a decision after much deliberation that leads directly to victory is exceptional!
Adjust your reach flexibly according to your opponent's actions and seize a new kind of victory!
70010000088490.name: Life or Reach

70010000089833.description:
The wild west gets even wilder with the development of cybernetic technology, and it’s up to you to take down the bandit gangs turning this tech against honest and hard-working locals! Step into the role of a steampunk gunslinger with a mechanical arm and loads of enhanced weaponry at your disposal. The Legend of Cyber Cowboy is a top-down twin-stick shooter presented in slick pixel art style.

Blast through waves of cyborg baddies and mechanical monsters in monocles and top hats as you explore dozens of procedurally generated rooms that change with each run to keep you on your leather booted toes. Destroy objects or use them for cover. Collect valuable energy tokens to purchase new weapons at shops. Use energy bursts to dash and dodge. Then prepare for a showdown with huge bosses in bullet hell shootouts.

Are you up to the challenge, Cowboy?

Features:

• Blast through 5 worlds of wild west mayhem as a cybernetic cowboy!
• Navigate procedurally generated saloons and wastelands.
• Collect valuable energy tokens to buy new weapons!
• Face off against big bosses in bullet hell shootouts.
• Enjoy colorful and crisp pixel art presentation!
70010000089833.intro: Liberate a town from gangs of cybernetic bandits as a steampunk gunslinger!
70010000089833.name: The Legend of Cyber Cowboy

70010000077674.description:
Originally conceived as a reimagining of the 16-bit console classic Ys III: Wanderers From Ys, this fan-favorite entry returns, newly remastered for the Nintendo Switch™ system as Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana. Nearly 15 years after its previous release, longtime fans can look forward to numerous improvements and upgrades, including an all-new voiceover for legendary protagonist, Adol Christin. With remastered high-definition visuals and music, the epic adventure has never looked or sounded better.

Additional features include multiple versions of the sweeping soundtrack, accessibility options, and brand-new character illustrations, making Ys Memoire the definitive edition of the acclaimed masterpiece. 

■Classic RPG Excitement Remastered 
Experience the old-school action RPG combat the Ys series is known for, with added difficulty options and quality-of-life enhancements like “Turbo” mode, as you fight your way through a memorable fantasy world.

■Refined Visual Variety 
Ys Memoire features all-new “Refined” character illustrations throughout the game, but players who want the original experience can switch to the “Classic” versions at a whim.

■A Silent Protagonist No Longer 
Newly recorded voice acting for Adol Christin, including an opening narration that sets the stage for adventure, gives new depth and gravity to the famous hero.

■A Sweeping Soundtrack Reborn 
Well-regarded for its outstanding soundtrack, this version features three different iterations of the epic score (Original, PC-8801, and X68000) for players to choose from, all remastered in high-quality audio.
70010000077674.intro: The classic Ys title returns, remastered for the Nintendo Switch™
70010000077674.name: Ys Memoire: The Oath in Felghana

70010000072754.description:
Morkull Ragast's Rage is a 2D video game that combines platforming and action with a touch of exploration.

You control Morkull, the villain of the story, who not only knows he's a character in a video game, but is also aware of the player who controls him (i.e., you) and the developers who created him (i.e., us).

Your objective? Help Morkull escape from the Ragast so he can rule the world and carry out his evil plans.
You know, typical cliché villain stuff...


Art and Animation

Morkull Ragast's Rage is completely hand-drawn and animated frame-by-frame. Inspired and influenced by traditional animated films and other 2D video games, the old-school style gives life and fluidity of movement to the whole cast of characters.

Break the Fourth Wall

What makes this game special is Morkull himself, his personality, and his ability to break the fourth wall to talk with the players like he was there in the room.

Morkull possesses charisma and charm, and never fails to create a light-hearted atmosphere with his endless humor, bad jokes and pop culture references.

Combat System

You'll have all the power of the God of Death and Darkness at your fingertips, of course, along with an ample selection of combos and abilities that will open up even the most remote corners of the Ragast.

Become Part of the Ragast and Join Our Community

Once you enter the Ragast, you'll never leave - unless you can get through Morkull… So why not join his ranks and support his Machiavellian cause with the rest of his champions as part of our Morkull Ragast's Rage community.
70010000072754.intro: Help Morkull escape this cursed Metroidvania video game!
70010000072754.name: Morkull Ragast's Rage

70010000084604.description:
Help Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong recover their precious banana hoard from the villainous Tiki Tak Tribe! Stomp enemies, blast through barrels, and ride rockets and mine carts (and even Rambi the rhino) in 80 levels across nine worlds.  

Play the game as it was first designed for the Wii™ system, or reduce the difficulty for extra hearts and other goodies to make your journey a little easier. This barrel-blasting adventure is visually enhanced in HD for the Nintendo Switch™ system and includes the extra levels from the Nintendo 3DS™ version! 

Team up with a friend and take on the whole game as Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong  

Pass a Joy-Con™ controller to a buddy and take on the Tiki Tak Tribe as DK and Diddy in two-player local play. Pelt foes with Diddy’s Peanut Popgun and hover using his Barrel Jet, and slam bad guys into submission with DK’s Ground Pound—or just Barrel Roll right through them. Work together to reclaim those bananas by the bunch!
70010000084604.intro: Jump, roll, and stomp through Donkey Kong Island in 2D platforming action
70010000084604.name: Donkey Kong Country™ Returns HD

70010000072916.description:
Tales of Graces f is back with a beautiful and easier-to-play version!

The game also includes Lineage and Legacies, an after-story to the main scenario!

Tales of Graces f is an action RPG about adventure in fantasy worlds and overcoming obstacles through friendship and determination.

• A child’s promise is the world’s last hope
On a lush green planet called Ephinea, three young children make a promise to each other that could save the future.
Asbel, heir to a local lord, Richard, prince of the Windor kingdom, and Sophie, a strange girl with no known past, all swear a special friendship oath after helping each other survive a dangerous attempt on Richard’s life in the land of Lhant.
Years later, the world has changed. Asbel and his friends must face grave danger when Lhant becomes the battleground for a power grab among the three great nations of Ephinea. It is at this moment when an even greater threat is revealed and the bonds between the young heroes are put to the test with everything at stake.

• Exhilarating continuous action with two styles to choose from!
The Style Shift Linear Motion Battle System allows players to switch between two very different battle styles, Artes  and Burst.
You can choose the strength and range of the party’s attacks, the size of the attack, and how close or far away you need to be to the enemy for maximum effectiveness.

• Addition of convenient functions and improved graphics
Quality-of-life  functions have been added, such as auto-save, various skip functions, the ability to turn off enemy encounters in fields and dungeons, and more.

• Full character development and item elements
There are more than 100 different equipable titles that players can rank up through battles, allowing them to learn various skills and techniques that strengthen their stats.

• Lineage and Legacies depicts the world after the ending
Six months have passed since the journey around the world. Sophie is troubled by uncomfortable thoughts about her eventual future and she is determined to find a way out. 
At the same time, strange changes spread throughout Ephinea once again. While Asbel is concerned about Sophie, she and her friends set out to investigate the cause of the anomaly...
70010000072916.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered

70050000052919.description:
Unlock the in-game item Super Adventuring Assistance Set early for Tales of Graces f Remastered.

Includes:
• Apple Gel x 10
• Grape Gel x 10
• Life Bottle x 10
• Panacea Bottle x 10

*This set can be obtained through game progression.
70050000052919.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered - Super Adventuring Assistance Set

A set of red herbs that can permanently boost a character’s stats in Tales of Graces f Remastered.

Includes:

70050000052920.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered - Super Growth Support Herb Set

70050000052921.name: Tales of Graces f Remastered - Battle BGM pack

The Deluxe Edition includes:
